sentences.english: It's been a while since we met.
sentences.arabic: لقد مر وقت طويل منذ أن التقينا.

sentences.english: I hope everything is going well.
sentences.arabic: أتمنى أن كل شيء يسير على ما يرام.
ما الذي أتى بك هنا اليوم؟

sentences.english: I'm looking forward to our conversation.
I'm pleased to meet you all.
I look forward to working with you.
I would like a coffee, please.
What types of coffee do you have?
Is this for here or to go?
sentences.arabic: هل هذا للجلوس هنا أم للخارج؟

sentences.english: Do you drink coffee every day?
Yes, I can't start without it.
Coffee is part of my morning routine.
Can you make it extra hot?

sentences.arabic: هل يمكنني الحصول على رغوة إضافية؟

sentences.english: What's the difference between espresso and americano?
Where does this coffee come from?
Would you like to try it?
How do you make this coffee?
Would you like to see the process?
We have a professional espresso machine.
We have strawberry, banana, and mango.
Yes, it's made with fresh fruits.
sentences.arabic: نعم، إنه مصنوع من فواكه طازجة.

sentences.english: You need frozen berries and yogurt.
I need to buy some groceries.
I need milk, bread, and eggs.
Where can I find the milk?
Yes, we got them this morning.
Shop early for the best selection.
sentences.arabic: تسوق مبكراً للحصول على أفضل اختيار.

sentences.english: I'd like to make a reservation.
Do you have any special requests?
A table by the window, please.
Is it for a special occasion?
I'll make sure to avoid them.
Can I get you anything else?
sentences.arabic: هل يمكنني إحضار أي شيء آخر؟

sentences.english: We have chocolate cake and ice cream.
Can I have the bill, please?
sentences.arabic: هل يمكنني الحصول على الفاتورة من فضلك؟

sentences.english: Excuse me, where is the bus stop?
Which bus goes to the city center?
sentences.arabic: أي حافلة تذهب إلى وسط المدينة؟

sentences.english: I need a ticket to downtown.
Can you call me a taxi?
It will be here in 5 minutes.
I need to check in for my flight.
Do you have any bags to check?
Please remove your shoes and belt.
I need to make a doctor's appointment.
What's the reason for your visit?
I have a headache and fever.
We have an opening tomorrow at 2 PM.
sentences.arabic: لدينا موعد متاح غداً في الساعة 2 مساءً.

sentences.english: That works for me, thank you.
I've been coughing for three days.
I'm here to pick up my prescription.
How often should I take it?
I need to call an ambulance.

sentences.arabic: نعم، هنا بطاقة التأمين الخاصة بي.

sentences.english: Good morning, please have a seat.
I have five years of experience in marketing.
sentences.arabic: لدي خمس سنوات من الخبرة في التسويق.

sentences.english: What interests you about this position?
sentences.arabic: ما الذي يثير اهتمامك في هذا المنصب؟

sentences.english: Do you work well in teams?
sentences.arabic: هل تعمل بشكل جيد في الفرق؟

sentences.english: We need to discuss the new project.
We have two weeks to complete it.
Yes, I'll respond by this afternoon.
Can you send me the report?
I'll attach it to my next email.
Today I'll present our quarterly results.
Let me start with the overview.
Are there any questions so far?
sentences.arabic: هل هناك أي أسئلة حتى الآن؟

sentences.english: I'll take questions at the end.
What's our budget for next quarter?
How will this affect our timeline?
sentences.arabic: كيف سيؤثر هذا على جدولنا الزمني؟

sentences.english: We should be able to stay on schedule.
sentences.arabic: يجب أن نتمكن من البقاء في الموعد المحدد.

sentences.english: What movie should we watch tonight?
sentences.arabic: أي فيلم يجب أن نشاهد الليلة؟

sentences.english: I heard the new action movie is great.
sentences.arabic: سمعت أن الفيلم الأكشن الجديد رائع.

sentences.english: Let's watch a romantic comedy then.
Two tickets for the 8 PM show, please.
sentences.arabic: تذكرتان لعرض الساعة 8 مساءً من فضلك.

sentences.english: Would you like popcorn and drinks?
Yes, one large popcorn and two sodas.
sentences.arabic: نعم، فشار كبير واثنان من الصودا.

sentences.english: Do you go to the gym regularly?
Yes, I work out three times a week.
sentences.arabic: نعم، أتمرن ثلاث مرات في الأسبوع.

sentences.english: I focus on cardio and strength training.
sentences.arabic: أركز على تمارين القلب وتقوية العضلات.

sentences.english: Do you play any team sports?

sentences.arabic: ألعب كرة القدم في عطلة نهاية الأسبوع.

topics.title: Music and Arts
topics.description: Discussing music, art, and cultural activities

sentences.english: What kind of music do you like?
I enjoy classical and jazz music.

sentences.arabic: هل تعزف على أي آلة موسيقية؟

sentences.english: Let's visit the art gallery this weekend.
sentences.arabic: دعنا نزور معرض الفنون هذا الأسبوع.
